name: Pixel That
description:
Pixel That is a Puzzle game where you'll have to complete the patterns with a limited number of blocks. This game was made for the Game Jam #7 of June 2017 organised by the French website GameCodeur.fr (where I'm member with the username: WhatsUpDesign).

The entire Game was made in less than 12 hours with html5 and Javascript (Phaser). The sounds were found on Freesounds.org. The graphic design was made by myself.

The theme of the Game Jam was "Create a Puzzle Game with a grid system". I had only few hours for this project, so I had to stay cool and keep that simple :) 

That's my first participation at a Game Jam so it was a new experience for me... I really like this kind of challenge ! Specially because, ironically, I am not really into the puzzle games. So without this Jam I would probably never code this game !

Hope you'll like it ! Enjoy
